channel.title: Making prayers work?
channel.description: Well yeah, I want to get all the prayers work- but firstly would like the protect prayers to work, and for the correct symbol to come above your head. E.G Protect from melee will protect from any melee monsters, and against other players will js act as like 20%? or w/e because i don't want it to block melee in Pking. I will be VERY grateful to anyone who helps. -Wed330

item.title: Making prayers work?
item.dc:creator: @mad_moparscapian mad_moparscapian
item.description:
@mad_moparscapian wrote:

Is it Czar Or Delta, I’m thinking its Czar, But not sure… Please include more details about your problem.

A large majority of topics in this section are not explained very well, easily seen by the first few posters asking to elaborate. From now on, if you fail to be as specific as possible, your topic may be locked. It is a complete waste of time for those who are trying to help if they have to post asking for you to elaborate. [b]So, if it means pictures, samples of code, and anything else you believe may be helpful to people who are trying to answer your question.[/b]

Just remember, the better you explain the problem you are experiencing, the better quality the replied posts will be, and the faster your issue will be resolved.

Read full topic
